name: loquat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also loquat tree) a tree that does not lose its leaves in winter, originally from East Asia, with flowers that appear in the autumn: These loquats are purely decorative and rarely bear fruit. He counted the fruit on the loquat tree every day.
the small, round fruit of this tree with a thin, smooth, yellow-orange skin, similar to a plum: Loquats can be eaten fresh, in salads, or cooked in meat dishes. The small loquats sweeten as they ripen. Synonym
Japanese plum
